com.nutiteq.styles

Class MarkerStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nutiteq.styles.Style
      • com.nutiteq.styles.BillboardStyle
        • com.nutiteq.styles.MarkerStyle

  • public class MarkerStyle
extends BillboardStyle
    A style for markers. Contains attributes for configuring how the marker is drawn on the screen.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MarkerStyle

        public MarkerStyle(long cPtr,
                   boolean cMemoryOwn)

      • MarkerStyle

        public MarkerStyle(Color color,
                   float attachAnchorPointX,
                   float attachAnchorPointY,
                   boolean causesOverlap,
                   boolean hideIfOverlapped,
                   float horizontalOffset,
                   float verticalOffset,
                   int placementPriority,
                   boolean scaleWithDPI,
                   float anchorPointX,
                   float anchorPointY,
                   Bitmap bitmap,
                   BillboardOrientation orientationMode,
                   BillboardScaling scalingMode,
                   float size)
        Constructs a MarkerStyle object from various parameters. Instantiating the object directly is
        not recommended, MarkerStyleBuilder should be used instead.
        Parameters:
        color - The color for the marker.
        attachAnchorPointX - The horizontal attaching anchor point for the marker.
        attachAnchorPointY - The vertical attaching anchor point for the marker.
        causesOverlap - The causes overlap flag for the marker.
        hideIfOverlapped - The hide if overlapped flag for the marker.
        horizontalOffset - The horizontal offset for the marker.
        verticalOffset - The vertical offset for the marker.
        placementPriority - The placement priority for the marker.
        scaleWithDPI - The scale with DPI flag for the label.
        anchorPointX - The horizontal anchor point for the marker.
        anchorPointY - The vertical anchor point for the marker.
        bitmap - The bitmap for the marker.
        orientationMode - The orientation mode for the marker.
        scalingMode - The scaling mode for the marker.
        size - The size for the marker.
